author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
It’s time to check in on our most recent neighbors!

So, while Pride month has somewhat slowed down in the states, at least for now, the same cannot be said for the York Regional Police Department.


The York Regional Police Department hold drag-queen pride month celebration funded by the Canadian taxpayer. pic.twitter.com/evCzjp4W3C
— Canadian Patriot Media (@realpatriotM) June 4, 2025

Ew. How do people even enjoy this nonsense? He's not even doing anything impressive, as he's just prancing around in an ugly cost
title: Police Department Holds Taxpayer-Funded Drag Queen Celebration For Pride Month

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
While the left claims it's compassionate to say that “no human is illegal,” some members of Congress have revealed their real motivation: to import a second-class workforce to “wipe the asses” of Americans.

Well, at least according to Congresswoman Becca Balint.

@BeccaBalintVT tells constituents at a town hall in Newport:

“if we don’t have avenues for people to come here legally to work or to build a home here… we’re not gonna have anyone around to wipe our a**es because we don’t have enough people” pic.twitter.com/f0PeoWtEj6
— Vermont Daily Chronicle (@VTDC802) May
title: Democrat Congresswoman demands we stop deporting illegal immigrants because we need them to, quote, "wipe our @$$es"

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Former Biden White House press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre, or some of you may have remembered her as America’s least favorite DEI pick, has officially come out as an independent and announced the release of her new book, Independent: A Look Inside a Broken White House, Outside the Party Lines.

NEW: Former press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre reveals her own “tell all” book about the Biden White House and reveals she is switching parties.

Wow. Out grifting Jake Tapper is an impressive accomplishment.

Jean-Pierre has revealed that she is now “coming out” as an…
title: Karine Jean-Pierre announces she left the Democrat Party, and OF COURSE she has a new book coming out

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Elon Musk has come out against Trump’s Big Beautiful Bill. Today’s show breaks this down.

“I am absolutely opposed to increased spending in almost every capacity,” Crowder said. “I don’t even know if we should have an income tax.”

According to Fox News:

The White House defended the President Donald Trump-endorsed "big, beautiful bill" Tuesday after o
title: Watch: Donald Trump vs Elon Musk and the Massive Battle Over the Big Beautiful Bill

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
The only problem with regulating speech in America is that you can’t actually do that, as this is a free country. Nonetheless, one school district thought it had the power to regulate and force students into politically correct, compelled speech. However, they thought wrong.

A high school student who was suspended for using the words “illegal alien” will be getting a public apology from the Board of Education and $20,000 after the district overstepped its boundaries.

BREAKING: Christian McGhee, the North Carolina teen who was suspended from school for using the term "illegal alien" in class, will receive $20,000 and a public apology from the Davidson County Board of Education (@dcsnc) after they falsely accus
title: Teen who was suspended from school for calling illegal aliens “illegal aliens” now has a sizable settlement and a public apology

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
In the name of inclusivity, the Paris Olympics turned a blind eye to women’s safety and fairness, despite how physically unsafe this was. And while I didn’t need to tell you Imane Khelif was a man, although I did, leftists all across the globe denied that biological reality, all under the guise of LGBT rights. And despite whatever feeling Khelif claimed to feel deep down inside, he is, in fact, a man, according to newly leaked medical records.

This is why J.K. Rowling said what needed to be said.

A raft of people
title: Remember that female Olympic boxer who people claimed wasn't a man? He's confirmed a man, and JK Rowling is saying "I told you so"

author: Brodigan
description:
Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth has announced they are getting rid of all the woke Navy ship names. Let’s see what’s on the list. Elon Musk has come out against Trump’s Big Beautiful Bill. Chuck Schumer agrees. Wait, what? The Supreme Court is having some problems figuring out their opinion on things that should be obvious, at least to the supposedly majority conservative court. Next on the docket is the 2nd Amendment. Let’s see what they do (or fail to do) this time. Former OnlyFans model Nala Ray has converted to Christianity and is now speaking at conservative conferences. Legit?

NAVY TO RENAME SHIPS
title: Elon vs. Trump: Everything Elon has Wrong about the Big Beautiful Bill (Sources)

author: Brodigan
description:
DJ Daniel is a 13-year-old battling cancer, who, besides being sworn in to over 1300 law enforcement agencies, is the youngest to ever serve in the Secret Service. He also got some unfortunate news this week, though this young king's focus is on helping other kids who are suffering, and he is wondering if anyone knows how to get in touch with Jason Aldean.

More importantly, prayers up from all of us at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website.

— (@)

Americans
title: 13-year-old secret service agent honored by Trump gets bad news, but he's still more concerned with helping other kids

author: Brodigan
description:
If you needed any further proof that Democrats are the anti-cop and pro-illegal immigrant party, here is Democrat Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries, aka Temu Obama (we'll call him T.O. for short), threatening to dox the American citizens tasked with deporting those who aren't. Or, "unauthorized immigrant."

Looks like that's the new thing the billionaires who control the left have come up with, and of course, the journalisming industry says, "Sure, we have no self-respect."

— (@)

ICE agents wearing masks i
title: Nothing to see here, just the Democrat Minority Leader THREATENING to dox ICE officials for enforcing the law
